content: *single_crochet in each of the next 5sts decrease repeat from * around 24sts rnds 26 single_crochet in each st around 24sts if adding underwear change yarn colour back to skin tone… rnds 27- 38^^ single_crochet in each st around 24sts sitting option ^^ if you would like your doll to sit continue as follows if you re happy with a standing doll stuff the legs firmly and skip to round 39 after working a few rounds of the body rnds 27-38 take the long tail you left on the first leg and using a darning needle pass it through to one side of the body and then use it to sew up the round at the top of the legs from one side of the body to the other closing up the small hole between the legs as you do so this helps to create the bend in the legs for sitting and stops the stuffing in the body from falling into the legs round 39 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease *single_crochet in each of the next 4sts decrease repeat from * around 20sts round 40 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts decrease *single_crochet in each of the next 3sts decrease repeat from * around 16sts in this next round we will be working a single_crochet into each st around and also attaching the arms at the same time remember to make sure the thumbs are at the front round 41 to begin with you need to single_crochet in each st until you reach the side of the body then work the next 4 single_crochet sts through the two loops in each st at the top of the arm as well as the two loops on the body please see photo then continue to single_crochet in each st to the other side of the body and attach the other arm in exactly the same way single_crochet in each remaining st around as appropriate 16sts round 42 single_crochet in each st around 16sts do not fasten_off and continue onto the… head begin by removing the stitch marker and placing it in the centre at the back of the doll as pictured if it s already there leave it in place if you have to undo a few stitches to get back to it do so now or if you need to as i did single_crochet into each stitch until you reach it before continuing continue to crochet in continuous spirals without joining the rounds using a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts optional neck definition & head support round still using skin tone yarn work a round of loose slip stitches into the back loops only of round 42…take note of the unworked front loops beneath the slip stitches… you will work the next round round 43 beneath those front loops…this creates an extra thick round that helps to define the
